data.text:
Rodgers & Hammerstein’s OKLAHOMA! Returns to Select Cinemas Nationwide!

Rodgers & Hammerstein’s OKLAHOMA! returns to select cinemas nationwide in a limited engagement, starting November 1st to celebrate the 60th Anniversary of the motion picture with an extended featurette, starring Kristin Chenoweth! Get your tickets today, here!

A CHORUS LINE – 40TH ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION VINYL FEATURING EIGHT NEVER-BEFORE-RELEASED DEMO RECORDINGS & MORE

Composer Marvin Hamlisch and Lyricist Edward Kleban Perform Songs from the Show’s 1974 Workshop New High-Resolution (24/96) Master Created From Surround Sound Remix Previously Only Available in SACD Format 180-Gram Vinyl LP Reissue Also Available (Pre-order here) We’re thrilled to celebrate A Chorus Line with A Chorus Line – 40th Anniversary Celebration, the definitive, newly […]

Happy Birthday, West Side Story! | Stephen Sondheim Discusses In Legends Of Broadway Exclusive

On this day 58 years ago, West Side Story opened to great acclaim on September 26, 1957 at the Winter Garden, where it played 732 performances, and was subsequently revived several times on Broadway and around the country. Stephen Sondheim discusses the show in our new Legends of Broadway video. Watch below.

New From The #MWBVault: The Beggars Opera Original London Cast Recording | Woman Of The Year

Richard Pillbrow and Harold Prince’s production of The Beggar’s Opera opened September 1968 at the Apollo Theatre in London. Starring Peter Gilmore, James Cossins and Jan Waters, the production was first performed at the Cambridge and Edinburgh Festivals and later for London Weekend Television. The story of Macheath and his band of beggars and thieves […]
